data.question: What is the empirical formula and formula weight of Pb(Clterpy)[Au(CN)2]2?
What type of bond lengths increase from 2.572(16) to 2.610(16) Å in Pb(Clterpy)[Au(CN)2]2?
What is the shortest distance between neighboring gold atoms in Mn(Clterpy)[Au(CN)2]2?
Is the birefringence of Pb(Clterpy)[Au(CN)2]2 significantly different from Pb(terpy)[Au(CN)2]2?
What is the birefringence value of Mn(Brterpy)[Au(CN)2]2?
Does the structure of Pb(Brterpy)(μ-OH2)0.5[Au(CN)2]2 exhibit significant disorder in some of the Au(CN)2− and water units?
What is the crystal system and space group of Pb(Clterpy)[Au(CN)2]2?
What is the primary reason for the high birefringence in Pb(terpy)[Au(CN)2]2?
data.answer: The parallel ligand orientation of the terpy units

data.question: What is the role of the stereochemically active lone pair in Pb(II) structures?
data.answer: It impacts the symmetry and bond lengths around the Pb(II) center

data.question: Is the birefringence of Mn(Clterpy)[Au(CN)2]2 approximately the same as Mn(terpy)[Au(CN)2]2?
What is the crystal growth direction of Mn(Brterpy)[Au(CN)2]2?
What is the effect of halogen substitution on the birefringence of coordination polymers?
data.answer: It can increase the birefringence if the halogen substitution position is judiciously chosen and properly aligned

data.question: Does the structure of Pb(Brterpy)(μ-OH2)0.5[Au(CN)2]2 form a 1D chain via the bridging axial Au(CN)2− units?
What is the role of Au−Au interactions in the structure of Mn(Clterpy)[Au(CN)2]2?
data.answer: They link two half-ladders to form a full ladder

data.question: What is the birefringence value of Pb(Clterpy)[Au(CN)2]2?
Are the Clterpy units in Mn(Clterpy)[Au(CN)2]2 perfectly aligned parallel to one another?
What is the extinction direction in Pb(Clterpy)[Au(CN)2]2 aligned with?
What is the impact of the stereochemically active lone pair on the birefringence of Pb(II) structures?
data.answer: It affects the bond lengths around the Pb(II) center, impacting the birefringence

data.question: What is the birefringence value of Pb(Brterpy)(μ-OH2)0.5[Au(CN)2]2?
Does the birefringence of Mn(Brterpy)[Au(CN)2]2 represent one of the highest values for solids reported to date?
